description: French leaders held a moment of silence in Nice, France, on Monday to honor the victims of last week's attack. Eighty-four people were killed and dozens more injured when a truck plowed through a crowd on Bastille Day.
title: Moment of Silence for Nice Victims
title_page: Moment of Silence for Nice Victims - Video - NYTimes.com
text: French leaders held a moment of silence in Nice, France, on Monday to honor the victims of last week's attack. Eighty-four people were killed and dozens more injured when a truck plowed through a crowd on Bastille Day.
